intralogistics.title: Intralogistics
intralogistics.description: We design and implement various projects in the intralogistics industry. Our specialization focuses on conveyor control technologies and high-speed sorting systems. We have developed our own modular platform for managing a variety of sorting systems, which allows for efficient and flexible management of logistics operations. Our platform is integrated with an innovative and intuitive HMI that makes it significantly easier for users to manage the system and monitor its performance.

automotive.title: Automotive
automotive.description: Our comprehensive experience allows us to implement projects for major automotive concerns, including the VW Group and DAG. To date, we have successfully completed projects in crucial production areas such as body, assembly and paint shop. The knowledge we possess and the skills we have acquired allow us to effectively take on any project challenge, providing our customers with end-to-end service at the highest level.

industryMachines.title: Industry machines
industryMachines.description:

aboutUs.description:
SCD Automation was founded in 2021 in Poznan, Poland, with a mission to provide innovative solutions for improving and automating manufacturing processes. We specialize in designing and implementing control systems for industries such as intralogistics, automotive and machinery.

Our team is a group of experienced and passionate engineers with not only a wealth of experience, but also a diversity of talents and skills. Each of us brings something unique, so that our projects are not only comprehensive, but also innovative and effective.

services.description:
We offer complex services in the field of electrical system design and PLC programming. Due to our experience and efforts, we are able to provide personalized solutions that meet the highest standards of quality and efficiency.

Our services include the design and implementation of electrical installations, including the preparation of schematics, installation and commissioning. In addition, we specialize in PLC programming, ensuring optimal control and automation of production processes.

electrical.title: Electrical instalation
electrical.description:
We are specialized in the comprehensive design and implementation of electrical installations. Our offer includes a full range of services, from the conceptual and design phase, through the execution of the installation at the customer's site, to the necessary measurements and tests.

In the conceptual and design phase, we work with clients to understand their needs and requirements. This allows us to create personalized solutions that perfectly match their expectations.

Our skilled technical teams ensure efficient and professional installation, according to the highest quality standards. We focus on timeliness and accuracy.

Upon completion of the installation, we carry out comprehensive measurements and tests to guarantee that all components work as expected and comply with applicable standards and regulations.
electrical.shortCut: We are specialized in the comprehensive design and implementation of electrical installations. Our offer includes a full range of services, from the conceptual and design phase, through the execution of the installation at the customer's site, to the necessary measurements and tests.

control.title: Control system
control.description:
We specialize in the design and implementation of PLC software, including our own proprietary solution that precisely controls and optimizes production flow. In addition, we also develop our own visualization, enabling clear and intuitive monitoring and management of production processes.

Our dedicated tools are built to be flexible, reliable and easy to configure, adapting to a variety of needs. The solutions are individually tailored to your needs, providing seamless control and efficiency throughout the production process. With a focus on the intralogistics and automotive industries, we bring expertise and an innovative approach to each project, enabling the latest technologies. and personalized solutions.
control.shortCut: We specialize in the design and implementation of PLC software, including our own proprietary solution that precisely controls and optimizes production flow. In addition, we also develop our own visualization, enabling clear and intuitive monitoring and management of production processes.

support.title: Support
support.description:
Ensuring the reliability and continuity of your system is critical to production efficiency. That's why we want to take care of this issue for you. Our company offers comprehensive technical support and maintenance services, available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.

Regardless of the problem, our skilled technical team is ready to provide you with remote assistance to guarantee system integrity and performance. In addition, we also offer preventive maintenance services to minimize the risk of failure by regularly inspecting and maintaining your system, keeping it running optimally at all times.
